page.title: 19THE ILMINSTER BY-PASS
page.content: The final go-ahead for the long awaited by-pass came in 1985. Ilminster is one of the last great bottlenecks on the A303 and the by-pass will help ease the flow of traffic especially in the holiday season when it sometimes seems like the whole of Britain is trying to get to the west country. There are some worries about the effects the by-pass will have on trade in Ilminster, and some of the local farmers are unhappy at having their farms cut in two by the road. Work is due to start in 1986. It will be interesting to see whether the new road unifies the villages of Horton and Broadway more, as at the moment they are divided by the existing A303. there will also be an increase in the value of property in the area once the traffic goes.
